physmisc.cpp

00001 #ifndef _physmisc_cpp
00002 #define _physmisc_cpp
00003 
00004 #include "SDL.h"
00005 #include "physdatatypes.h"
00006 #include "physmisc.h"
00007 
00008 PhysString GetNameOfEventFrom( RawEvent event )
00009 {
00010         switch(event.type)
00011         {
00012             case SDL_ACTIVEEVENT:   //when the window gains focus
00013                 return "SDL_ACTIVEEVENT";
00014             case SDL_VIDEORESIZE:   //when the screen is resized
00015                 return "SDL_VIDEORESIZE";
00016             case SDL_VIDEOEXPOSE:   //when the windows goes from being hidden to being shown
00017                 return "SDL_VIDEOEXPOSE";
00018             case SDL_QUIT:          //when SDL closes
00019                 return "SDL_QUIT";
00020             case SDL_SYSWMEVENT:
00021                 return "SDL_SYSWMEVENT";
00022             case SDL_KEYDOWN:
00023                 return "SDL_KEYDOWN";
00024             case SDL_KEYUP:
00025                 return "SDL_KEYUP";
00026             case SDL_MOUSEMOTION:
00027                 return "SDL_MOUSEMOTION";
00028             case SDL_MOUSEBUTTONDOWN:
00029                 return "SDL_MOUSEBUTTONDOWN";
00030             case SDL_MOUSEBUTTONUP:
00031                 return "SDL_MOUSEBUTTONUP";
00032             case SDL_JOYAXISMOTION:
00033                 return "SDL_JOYAXISMOTION";
00034             case SDL_JOYBUTTONDOWN:
00035                 return "SDL_JOYBUTTONDOWN";
00036             case SDL_JOYBUTTONUP:
00037                 return "SDL_JOYBUTTONUP";
00038             case SDL_JOYBALLMOTION:
00039                 return "SDL_JOYBALLMOTION";
00040             case SDL_JOYHATMOTION:
00041                 return "SDL_JOYHATMOTION";
00042             case SDL_USEREVENT://Never thrown by SDL, but could be added by a user
00043                 return "SDL_USEREVENT";
00044             default:
00045                 return "Unknown SDL Event Inserted";
00046         }
00047 }
00048 
00049 #endif
